description:
Built a Meeting Room Booking & Minutes Management System using Laravel (API), React.js, and MySQL.

Features:
- Room scheduling with conflict prevention, calendar views, and interactive floor maps
- Sanctum-authenticated user roles (Admin/Employee/Guest) with dedicated admin panel
- MoM (Minutes of Meeting) module with action item tracking and PDF summaries

Also optimized database queries and API integrations for improved performance.

Developed RESTful APIs for a reservation system using .NET and SQL Server, ensuring reliable and secure data management.

Designed and implemented responsive front-end pages with AngularJS, seamlessly integrating them with the .NET backend for dynamic data interaction.

Optimized database operations by creating and utilizing stored procedures to improve performance and maintainability.
